subject: College Athletics
Hoaxes
Football
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Manti Te’o broke his silence Friday and told ESPN that he did not make up the story of a girlfriend who had died to bolster his chances of winning the Heisman Trophy.
snippet: Manti Te’o broke his silence Friday and told ESPN that he did not make up the story of a girlfriend who had died to bolster his chances of winning the Heisman Trophy.
